CustomField.description: If "Any user" is selected, the RLM will execute without sharing in system mode. If "Only authorized users" (i.e. user has “Read” permission on the object) is selected, the RLM will execute in user mode.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select who can execute this RLM: either only authorized users who have access to this record or any user.
CustomField.label: Who Can Execute This RLM
